name: King of the Keys of the Kastle
name_original: King of the Keys of the Kastle
description:
2 Player

Red versus Green

Hit the keys of whichever color you like more

I only played this once. I would have played it again but I didn't like the way people were handling my keyboard. So that was that.

Keys = Get you to the castle

Space bar = Start game/make kill shot

Esc = Escapes or cancels game
